                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Granular Wrapping: It's a good practice to place error boundaries at a granular level to handle the errors of specific parts of the UI.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Limitations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Not a Silver Bullet: They do not catch errors for:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Event handlers (use try/catch instead).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Asynchronous code (e.g., setTimeout or requestAnimationFrame callbacks).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Server-side rendering.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Errors thrown in the error boundary itself (rather than its children).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Best Practices

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Use Sparingly: Don’t overuse error boundaries. Use them in strategic places to provide the best user experience.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Fallback UI: Provide a meaningful fallback UI that guides users on what to do next after an error has occurred.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Error boundaries are a powerful feature in React for improving the robustness and user experience of the application by gracefully handling unexpected errors in the UI.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # React Hooks

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                React Hooks are functions that let you "hook into" React state and lifecycle features from function components. Introduced in React 16.8, they enable you to use state and other React features without writing a class.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Key Features of Hooks

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • State Management: useState allows you to add state to functional components.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Side Effects: useEffect lets you perform side effects in function components.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Custom Hooks: Create your own Hooks to reuse stateful logic between components.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Additional Hooks: React provides other built-in Hooks like useContext, useReducer, useCallback, useMemo, and useRef.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Basic Hooks

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # useState

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Purpose: Adds local state to a function component.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Example:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import { useState } from "react";

function Example() {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);
  return (
    <div>
      <p>You clicked {count} times</p>
      <button onClick={() => setCount(count + 1)}>Click me</button>
    </div>
  );
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # useEffect

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Purpose: Adds the ability to perform side effects in function components.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Example:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import { useEffect } from "react";

function Example() {
  useEffect(() => {
    document.title = `You clicked ${count} times`;
  });
  // Other component logic
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # useContext

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Purpose: Lets you subscribe to React context without introducing nesting.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Example:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import { useContext } from "react";
import { ThemeContext } from "./theme-context";

function Example() {
  const theme = useContext(ThemeContext);
  // Use theme in your component
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Benefits of Hooks

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Code Reusability and Composition: Custom Hooks make it easy to reuse stateful logic between components.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Simplified Code: Less code compared to equivalent class-based components.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Easier to Understand: Hooks reduce the complexity of managing this context and lifecycle methods in classes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Usage Guidelines

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Only at the Top Level: Only call Hooks at the top level of your components. Don’t call Hooks inside loops, conditions, or nested functions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Only in React Functions: Call Hooks from React function components, not regular JavaScript functions or class components.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                React Hooks represent a significant shift in how components are written and state is managed in React applications, making function components more powerful and versatile.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # React Hooks

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                React Hooks are functions introduced in React 16.8 that allow you to use state and other React features in functional components. They enable a more functional approach to component development without relying on classes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Key Concepts of Hooks

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Functional Components: Previously, functional components in React were stateless. Hooks allow these components to manage state and side effects.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Reusability and Composition: Hooks promote the reuse of stateful logic across components without the complexity of render props or higher-order components.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Basic Hooks

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # useState

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Purpose: To add state to functional components.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Example:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import { useState } from "react";

function Example() {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);

  return (
    <div>
      <p>You clicked {count} times</p>
      <button onClick={() => setCount(count + 1)}>Click me</button>
    </div>
  );
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                useState provides a way to declare state variables in functional components.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # useEffect

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Purpose: To handle side effects in functional components.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import { useEffect } from "react";

function Example() {
  useEffect(() => {
    // Side effect logic here
    document.title = `You clicked ${count} times`;
  });

  // Component render logic
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                useEffect is used for operations like data fetching, subscriptions, or manually changing the DOM.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # useContext

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Purpose: To access React context without nesting.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import { useContext } from "react";
import { ThemeContext } from "./theme-context";

function Example() {
  const theme = useContext(ThemeContext);
  // Use theme in component
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                useContext makes it easier to consume context values in functional components.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Advanced Hooks

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • useReducer: An alternative to useState, ideal for managing more complex state logic.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • useCallback: Returns a memoized callback function.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • useMemo: Returns a memoized value.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • useRef: Returns a mutable ref object.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • useImperativeHandle: Customizes the instance value exposed to parent components when using ref.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • useLayoutEffect: Similar to useEffect, but it fires synchronously after all DOM mutations.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • useDebugValue: Used to display a label for custom hooks in React DevTools.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Principles

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Only Call Hooks at the Top Level: Don’t call Hooks inside loops, conditions, or nested functions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Only Call Hooks from React Functions: Use Hooks from React functional components or from custom Hooks.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                React Hooks greatly simplify component logic, making it easier to manage state and side effects in functional components.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Rules for Using React Hooks

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                While using React Hooks, there are specific rules that must be followed to ensure code consistency and avoid common bugs. These rules are enforced by the React team to make the use of Hooks as effective and error-free as possible.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # 1. Only Call Hooks at the Top Level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Consistent Order: Hooks must be called at the top level of a React function component or a custom Hook. This ensures that Hooks are called in the same order each time the component renders.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Not in Loops, Conditions, or Nested Functions: Avoid calling Hooks inside loops, conditions, or nested functions to maintain their call order.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                // Correct
function ExampleComponent() {
  const [state, setState] = useState(0);
  // ...
}

// Incorrect
function ExampleComponent({ condition }) {
  if (condition) {
    const [state, setState] = useState(0); // Wrong! This should not be inside a condition
  }
  // ...
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # 2. Only Call Hooks from React Functions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Where to Call: Hooks should be called within React functional components or custom Hooks.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Not in Regular JavaScript Functions: Avoid calling Hooks from regular JavaScript functions or class components.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                // Correct
function ExampleComponent() {
  const [state, setState] = useState(0);
  // ...
}

function useCustomHook() {
  const [state, setState] = useState(0);
  // ...
}

// Incorrect
function regularFunction() {
  const [state, setState] = useState(0); // Wrong! Hooks should not be called in regular JS functions
  // ...
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # 3. Use Hooks from React Packages

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • React's Hooks: Ensure that you are using Hooks provided by React (e.g., useState, useEffect, etc.) or custom Hooks.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Not from Non-React Functions: Avoid creating Hooks that mimic the functionality of native React Hooks but are not from React packages.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # 4. Custom Hook Naming Convention

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Naming: Custom Hooks should start with use. This naming convention helps with automatic linting and is a best practice in the React community.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                // Correct
function useCustomHook() {
  // Custom hook logic
}

// Incorrect
function customFunction() {
  // This is not recognized as a hook
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Ensuring Compliance

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • ESLint Plugin: React provides an ESLint plugin (eslint-plugin-react-hooks) that helps in automatically enforcing these rules in your codebase.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Following these rules is crucial for the correct operation of your React components and for avoiding subtle bugs related to the misuse of Hooks.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # useEffect React Hook

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                The useEffect Hook in React is used to perform side effects in functional components. It serves the same purpose as componentDidMount, componentDidUpdate, and componentWillUnmount in class components but unified into a single API.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Core Functionality

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Side Effects: Includes data fetching, subscriptions, manually changing the DOM, and more.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Runs After Render: useEffect executes after the first render and after every update by default.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Basic Usage

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import React, { useEffect } from "react";

function ExampleComponent() {
  useEffect(() => {
    // Side effect logic here
    document.title = "Updated Title";
  });

  return <div>Example Component</div>;
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                In this example, useEffect is used to update the document title after the component renders.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Dependency Array

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Control Execution: The second argument of useEffect is a dependency array. useEffect will only re-run when the values in this array change.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Empty Array: If an empty array is provided, useEffect runs once after the initial render, similar to componentDidMount.
