                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  { type: 'ADD_TODO', text: 'Learn Redux' }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Reducers

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Pure Functions: Reducers are pure functions that take the previous state and an action as arguments and return the next state.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Deterministic: Given the same input, a reducer should always return the same output.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Immutability

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • State is Read-Only: In Redux, you never mutate the state directly. Instead, reducers return new state objects based on the previous state and the action received.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Usage with React

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                React-Redux

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                react-redux Library: Provides bindings for using Redux with React, such as the Provider component and useSelector, useDispatch hooks.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux";

function MyComponent() {
  const count = useSelector((state) => state.count);
  const dispatch = useDispatch();

  return (
    <div>
      <p>Count: {count}</p>
      <button onClick={() => dispatch({ type: "INCREMENT" })}>Increment</button>
    </div>
  );
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Benefits

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Predictable State Management: Makes state mutations predictable and transparent.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Debugging Tools: Comes with powerful development tools, like time-travel debugging.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Scalability: Scales well with large applications. Ecosystem and Middleware: Robust ecosystem and support for middleware.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # When to Use Redux

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Complex State Logic: Beneficial for large-scale applications with complex state logic, multiple sources of truth, or deep nesting of components.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Global State: Useful when multiple components need to access and modify the same state.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Redux provides a consistent and predictable way to manage and update the state in JavaScript applications, simplifying the flow of data and making the development process more efficient and easier to debug.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Reducer, Action, Store in Redux

In Redux, the concepts of reducer, action, and store are fundamental to its architecture for managing the state of applications. Here's a breakdown of each:

## Action

### Definition
- **Purpose**: Actions are JavaScript objects that send data from the application to the Redux store. They are the only source of information for the store.

### Structure
- **Type Property**: Each action has a `type` property, which is a string indicating the type of action being performed.
- **Payload**: Actions can also have a `payload` that contains the data or information to be processed.

### Example
```javascript
{
  type: 'ADD_TODO',
  payload: 'Learn Redux'
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Dispatching Actions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Actions are sent to the store using the dispatch() function.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Reducer

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Definition

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Purpose: Reducers are pure functions that take the current state and an action as arguments and return the new state.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Characteristics

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Deterministic: Given the same arguments, it should return the same state.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • No Side Effects: Reducers should not have side effects; they must only compute the new state.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                function todoReducer(state = [], action) {
  switch (action.type) {
    case "ADD_TODO":
      return [...state, action.payload];
    default:
      return state;
  }
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Role in Redux

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Reducers specify how the application's state changes in response to actions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Store

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Definition

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Purpose: The store is the object that brings actions and reducers together. It holds the application state, allows access to the state, and allows state to be updated via dispatch(action).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Functions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • getState(): Returns the current state tree of the application.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • dispatch(action): Dispatches an action to trigger state updates.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • subscribe(listener): Registers a listener. It’s called whenever an action is dispatched.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Creating a Store

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Created using Redux’s createStore() method.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • The store is typically created by passing in the reducer.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import { createStore } from "redux";
const store = createStore(todoReducer);

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Single Store

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • In Redux, there is a single store that contains the entire state tree of the application.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                In summary, actions are used to describe what should happen, reducers process actions and return a new state, and the store manages the application state and updates it in response to actions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Middleware in Redux

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Middleware in Redux is a powerful feature that provides a way to interact with dispatched actions before they reach the reducer. It's commonly used for logging, crash reporting, performing asynchronous tasks, and more.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Core Concept

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Intermediate Layer

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Functionality: Middleware acts as an intermediate layer between dispatching an action and the moment it reaches the reducer.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Chain of Functions: Multiple middlewares can be used in a sequence, forming a pipeline for action processing.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Usage

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Enhancing Store's Abilities

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Asynchronous Operations: Middleware like redux-thunk or redux-saga is used to handle asynchronous actions, like API calls.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Logging: Middleware such as redux-logger can log actions and state changes to the console, which is helpful for debugging.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Modifying Actions: Middleware can modify actions or delay the dispatch of actions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Example of Custom Middleware

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                const myMiddleware = (store) => (next) => (action) => {
  // Perform actions here before passing the action to the next middleware or reducer
  console.log("Action Type:", action.type);
  next(action);
};

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Integration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Applying Middleware

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • applyMiddleware Function: Redux provides the applyMiddleware function to apply middleware to the store.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Store Creation: Middleware is specified during the creation of the Redux store.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import { createStore, applyMiddleware } from "redux";
import rootReducer from "./reducers";
import myMiddleware from "./middleware";

const store = createStore(rootReducer, applyMiddleware(myMiddleware));

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Popular Redux Middleware

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # redux-thunk

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Purpose: Allows action creators to return functions (thunks) instead of actions. Useful for handling complex synchronous logic or asynchronous processes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # redux-saga

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Purpose: A more advanced middleware for managing side effects, using ES6 generators.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # redux-logger

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Purpose: Logs every action and the resulting new state to the console.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Conclusion

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Middleware in Redux adds an extra layer of flexibility and control to the store, allowing for more sophisticated and fine-grained handling of actions and application flow, especially in the context of asynchronous operations and side effects.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Redux-Saga

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Redux-Saga is a library that aims to make application side effects (i.e., asynchronous things like data fetching and impure things like accessing the browser cache) easier to manage, more efficient to execute, testable, and better at handling failures.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Core Concept

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Redux-Saga uses an ES6 feature called Generators to make asynchronous flows easy to read, write, and test. Sagas are implemented as Generator functions that yield objects to the redux-saga middleware.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Usage

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Sagas for Side Effects

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Asynchronous Actions: Handles complex asynchronous actions like API calls, data fetching, and more.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Listeners: Sagas can listen for dispatched Redux actions and then decide what to do: call an API, dispatch other actions, etc.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Saga

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import { call, put, takeEvery } from "redux-saga/effects";

// Worker saga: will be fired on USER_FETCH_REQUESTED actions
function* fetchUser(action) {
  try {
    const user = yield call(Api.fetchUser, action.payload.userId);
    yield put({ type: "USER_FETCH_SUCCEEDED", user: user });
  } catch (e) {
    yield put({ type: "USER_FETCH_FAILED", message: e.message });
  }
}

// Starts fetchUser on each dispatched `USER_FETCH_REQUESTED` action
function* mySaga() {
  yield takeEvery("USER_FETCH_REQUESTED", fetchUser);
}

export default mySaga;

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Integration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import { createStore, applyMiddleware } from "redux";
import createSagaMiddleware from "redux-saga";

import rootReducer from "./reducers";
import mySaga from "./sagas";

// Create the saga middleware
const sagaMiddleware = createSagaMiddleware();

// Mount it on the Store
const store = createStore(rootReducer, applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware));

// Then run the saga
sagaMiddleware.run(mySaga);

// Render the application

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Explanation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • fetchUser Saga: This is a worker saga that performs the user fetching task.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • mySaga: This is a watcher saga that listens for USER_FETCH_REQUESTED actions and calls fetchUser whenever the action is dispatched.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Redux Store: The store is created with the saga middleware, and the root saga (mySaga) is started using sagaMiddleware.run(mySaga).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Benefits

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Declarative Effects: Effects like call, put, and takeEvery make sagas easier to read and test.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Handling Complex Scenarios: Suitable for complex scenarios like background thread-like behavior, request cancellation, and more.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Conclusion

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Redux-Saga provides a powerful and elegant way to handle side effects in Redux applications, leveraging ES6 Generators for better workflow management and readability.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Redux-Thunk vs Redux-Saga

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Redux-Thunk and Redux-Saga are middleware libraries used in Redux for handling side effects, but they have different approaches and use cases. Understanding their differences is key to choosing the right one for your project.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Redux-Thunk

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Overview

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Simplicity: Thunk is simpler and easier to use. It's a good choice for basic Redux side effects and for beginners.
