                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Methods:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • static getDerivedStateFromError(error): Used to render a fallback UI after an error is caught.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • componentDidCatch(error, info): Used to log error information.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Deprecated Lifecycle Methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Note: Some lifecycle methods are deprecated in newer versions of React, such as componentWillMount, componentWillReceiveProps, and componentWillUpdate.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Importance of Lifecycle Methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • State and DOM Management: They provide a structured way to manage state and interact with the DOM efficiently.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Side Effects: Lifecycle methods are ideal for handling side effects, such as API calls and subscriptions.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Performance Optimization: Methods like shouldComponentUpdate and componentDidUpdate can be used for performance optimizations.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Lifecycle methods are crucial for the proper functioning of class components in React. They offer precise control over the update cycle of components, from initialization to teardown, ensuring efficient and effective management of resources.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                This summary provides a comprehensive overview of the lifecycle methods in React class components, detailing each method’s purpose and the stage of the lifecycle it belongs to, including mounting, updating, unmounting, and error handling phases.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Difference Between export default and export in React JS

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                In React JS, and JavaScript modules in general, export default and export are two different ways of exporting modules (components, functions, objects, etc.). Understanding their differences is important for properly structuring your code and importing modules.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # export

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Named Exports

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Multiple Exports: Allows multiple named exports from a single module.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Usage: You can export multiple entities (components, functions, objects, etc.) from a single file.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Syntax:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                export const MyComponent = () => {
  /* ... */
};
export const anotherComponent = () => {
  /* ... */
};

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Import Syntax:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import { MyComponent, anotherComponent } from "./MyModule";

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Characteristics

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Selective Import: Import only the specific entities you need.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Renaming: You can rename exports when importing.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Use Case: Useful when a module provides several functionalities that are independent of each other.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # export default

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Default Export

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Single Export: Only one default export allowed per module.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Usage: Commonly used for the main functionality or component provided by the module.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Syntax

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                const MyComponent = () => {
  /* ... */
};
export default MyComponent;

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Import Syntax:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import MyComponent from "./MyModule";

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Characteristics

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Import Flexibility: When importing a default export, you can name it whatever you like.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Simplicity: Simplifies the import when the module exports only one entity or a primary entity.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Use Case: Ideal for components or libraries that export a single entity.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Key Differences

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Number of Exports:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • export: Multiple named exports per module.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • export default: One default export per module.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Import Syntax:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • export: Uses curly braces and requires the exact name (unless you use the as keyword for renaming).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • export default: Does not use curly braces, and the importer can name it freely.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Use Case:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • export: When a module provides multiple functionalities.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • export default: When a module is centered around a single primary functionality.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Renaming:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • export: Allows renaming at the import site.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • export default: No specific name to use, so renaming is inherent.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Conclusion

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Choosing between export default and export depends on how you want to structure your modules and what you want to expose from them. Both have their use cases and can even be used together in the same module.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Portals in React JS

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                In React, a portal is a first-class way to render children into a DOM node that exists outside the DOM hierarchy of the parent component. Portals provide a powerful solution for rendering components in a different place than where they were declared in the JSX.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Core Concept

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Break Out of Parent Container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • DOM Hierarchy: Normally, React components are rendered within their parent DOM hierarchy. However, portals allow you to render a component into a different location in the DOM.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Use Case: Commonly used for modals, pop-ups, tooltips, and cases where a child component needs to visually 'break out' of its parent container.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Usage

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Creating a Portal

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • API: ReactDOM.createPortal(child, container).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Parameters:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • child: The React element or component to be rendered.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • container: The DOM element to mount the portal into.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import React from "react";
import ReactDOM from "react-dom";

class MyComponent extends React.Component {
  render() {
    // A portal that renders this.props.children into 'domNode'
    // 'domNode' is any valid DOM node, regardless of its location in the DOM
    return ReactDOM.createPortal(this.props.children, domNode);
  }
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Example Use Case: Modal

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                const Modal = ({ children }) => {
  // Appending the modal to 'body' of the document
  return ReactDOM.createPortal(
    <div className='modal'>{children}</div>,
    document.body
  );
};

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Characteristics

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Event Bubbling

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Consistent Event Bubbling: Despite being in a different DOM tree, events in a portal bubble up through the React tree, not the DOM tree.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Styling and Positioning

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • CSS Context: The portal's styling and positioning are based on its DOM location, not its React tree location.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Accessibility

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • A11y Considerations: Careful attention to accessibility is needed, especially with modals, to ensure focus management and screen reader behavior.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Conclusion

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Portals in React are a powerful feature for rendering content outside the parent component's DOM hierarchy, especially useful for UI elements that need to visually 'break out' of their container. They maintain the same behavior as normal React children in terms of context and event bubbling.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Reconciliation in React JS

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Reconciliation is a fundamental process in React that allows it to efficiently update the DOM. It's the algorithm behind React's ability to compare the rendered tree (virtual DOM) with the previous render and make only the necessary DOM updates.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Core Concept

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Virtual DOM Comparison

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Efficient Updates: React maintains a virtual DOM to represent the UI. During each render, React creates a new virtual DOM tree.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Diffing Algorithm: Reconciliation is the process of comparing the new virtual DOM tree with the previous one to determine the minimal changes required in the actual DOM.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # How Reconciliation Works

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Identifying Changes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Element Type Changes: If the root elements of two trees have different types, React will tear down the old tree and build the new tree from scratch.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Element Key Changes: When comparing lists of elements, React uses keys to identify which elements have changed, been added, or removed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Updating the DOM

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Minimal Changes: The algorithm updates the DOM in a way that only necessary changes are made, improving performance, especially for complex applications.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Example

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                When a component’s state changes, causing a re-render:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1. New Virtual DOM Tree: React creates a new virtual DOM tree based on the updated state.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2. Comparison: The new tree is compared with the previous tree.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3. Determine Changes: React figures out which elements have changed.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                4. Update Actual DOM: Only the changed elements are updated in the real DOM.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Benefits

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Performance

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Efficiency: Reduces the performance cost of updating the DOM, as DOM operations are expensive.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Optimization: Provides a solid foundation for React's performance optimizations.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Predictability

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Consistency: Ensures UI consistency as React manages all updates and state changes.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Control: Developers can control the process using keys and shouldComponentUpdate for further optimization.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Conclusion

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Reconciliation in React is a crucial process that ensures efficient and effective updates to the UI. By understanding and utilizing this process, developers can build fast and responsive applications with React.
